page.title: 07BIOGRAPHY-MRS.IRENE ANSTIS
page.content: Mrs. Anstis has taught at Cobham Middle School for 33 years. At 26 she had a class of 52 pupils with 50 desks. Her classroom was lit by gas. The children brought fresh flowers to school each Monday and 1d. for a bottle of milk each day. In the morning the children would do RE, maths and English. In the afternoon they would have history, geography and nature study. They went home at 1600. Lunch was 1200-1345. She remembered that a girl that was to be Mary in a Nativity play came late in a taxi. When she first taught at the school there was a new cane each year. Girls were caned on their hands and boys on their bottoms. Once Mrs. Anstis was hitting a boy with a ruler when it snapped.
